title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4403.11 - Affirmative duty of notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4403.11 - Affirmative duty of notification

State Regulations

Each board of directors has an affirmative duty to report
to the commission any change or intended change of any fact or proposal that is
part of its plan of operation as submitted to the commission, or of any change
that is material to the operation of the corporation. All such changes in the
plan of operation shall be of no effect until the same shall have been approved
by the commission in the same manner as an amendment to a plan of
operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4403.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
